Title: 900 - SignalR and Reactive Programming
Tip: Build a command service to broker the SignalR messages.

Summary.What: The command service is the central point for processing all messages to and from other clients.
Summary.Why: Doing synchronization in one place simplifies writing code, testing, and maintenance.
Summary.How: The Command Service listens to messages from both SignalR and BlazorComponentBus.
